external_references.source_name: Cisco IOS Software Integrity Assurance - Run-Time Memory Verification
external_references.description: Cisco. (n.d.). Cisco IOS Software Integrity Assurance - Cisco IOS Run-Time Memory Integrity Verification. Retrieved October 19, 2020.

objects.description: Monitor for changes made to the checksum of the operating system file and verifying the image of the operating system in memory.(Citation: Cisco IOS Software Integrity Assurance - Image File Verification)(Citation: Cisco IOS Software Integrity Assurance - Run-Time Memory Verification) Detection of this behavior may be difficult, detection efforts may be focused on closely related adversary behaviors, such as Modify System Image.
